div.div:
ANNOUNCEMENTS FOR
MCCOVID-19 pdf Fact sheet 4-17-2020
See below on Bulletin Board for more info.
A
Academics
Academics and Athleticism go hand in hand.
Academics are first priority. Athletics teach students the important lessons about hard work, respect, and responsibility which carry over into the classroom.
B
Benefits
The benefits of the small school atmosphere.
There exists in the small school a sense of pride, and an attitude and sense of personal possession and involvement on the part of students, parents, teachers, administrators, and community residents.
C
Community
We believe in creating community leaders.
At White Sulphur Springs Schools, we understand the importance of community. This is why we strive to instill in our students the concept of leadership and developing a strong community-mindset.
D
Dedication
At White Sulphur Springs Schools
We are dedicated to working together to assist students in becoming responsible, educated citizens and life-long learners. We are committed to providing quality educational opportunities in a safe and positive atmosphere.
[/row]
Our Mission
White Sulphur Springs Schools, with the support of parents and the community, will provide quality educational opportunities in a safe, positive atmosphere. Working together we will assist all students in becoming responsible, educated citizens and life-long learners.
